items.label: field Scenarios
items.default:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<lte>
    <scenarios>
	<num_of_scen>1</num_of_scen>

	<!-- Scenario_0 -->
	<scen>

	   <!-- Thread is sequence of procedures and commands, that could be executed number of times, thread could consist anothers threads -->

	   <!-- Procedures types: ATTACH=0, DETACH=1, ADB=2, DADB=3, PDN_CONN=4, PDN_DISCONN=5, MDB=6-->

	    <thread>
		<num_of_iter>1</num_of_iter>

		<!-- ATTACH cid=0, bid=0-->
		<proc>
		    <type>0</type>
		</proc>

		<cmd>
		    <!-- Delay in msec -->
		    <delay>10000</delay>
		</cmd>

        <!-- Trigger Measurement Report -->
        <proc>
            <type>9</type>
            <params>
                <!-- rsrp -->
                <rsrp>30</rsrp>
                <!-- rsrq -->
                <rsrq>30</rsrq>
                <!-- pci -->
                <pci>901</pci>
            </params>
        </proc>

        <cmd>
            <!-- Delay in msec -->
            <delay>10000</delay>
        </cmd>


        <!-- start traffic -->
        <proc>
            <type>7</type>
            <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
            <params>
            <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
            <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
                 <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>
                 <direction>3</direction>
            </params>
        </proc>

         <cmd>
         <!-- Delay in msec 1Day-->
            <delay>180000</delay>
         </cmd>

          <proc>
             <type>8</type>
             <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
             <params>
             <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
             <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
                 <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>
                 <direction>3</direction>
             </params>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
         <!-- Delay in msec -->
            <delay>5000</delay>
         </cmd>

         <proc>
             <!-- type 10 is for SCG Deletion(SCG_FAILURE) -->
             <type>10</type>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
         <!-- Delay in msec -->
            <delay>5000</delay>
         </cmd>

         <!-- start traffic -->
         <proc>
             <type>7</type>
             <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
             <params>
             <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
             <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
             <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>
             <direction>3</direction>
             </params>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
             <!-- Delay in msec 1Day-->
             <delay>180000</delay>
         </cmd>

         <proc>
             <type>8</type>
             <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
             <params>
             <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
             <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
             <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>
             <direction>3</direction>
             </params>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
             <!-- Delay in msec 1Day-->
             <delay>5000</delay>
         </cmd>

         <!-- DETACH cid=0, bid=0-->
         <proc>
             <type>1</type>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
             <!-- Delay in msec -->
             <delay>5000</delay>
         </cmd>

         </thread>
       </scen>

    </scenarios>

</lte>

scenario.label: scenario
scenario.default:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<lte>
    <scenarios>
	<num_of_scen>1</num_of_scen>
	
	<!-- Scenario_0 -->	
	<scen>
	   
	   <!-- Thread is sequence of procedures and commands, that could be executed number of times, thread could consist anothers threads -->
	   
	   <!-- Procedures types: ATTACH=0, DETACH=1, ADB=2, DADB=3, PDN_CONN=4, PDN_DISCONN=5, MDB=6-->

	    <thread>
		<num_of_iter>1</num_of_iter>
		
		<!-- ATTACH cid=0, bid=0-->
		<proc>
		    <type>0</type>		
		</proc>
		
		<cmd>
		    <!-- Delay in msec -->
		    <delay>5000</delay>		
		</cmd>

                <!-- start traffic -->
       <proc>
            <type>7</type>
            <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
            <params>
            <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
            <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
                 <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>                                                                                                                            
                 <direction>3</direction>
            </params>
        </proc>

         <cmd>
         <!-- Delay in msec 1Day-->
            <delay>3000000</delay>
            <!--delay>15000</delay-->
         </cmd>

          <proc>
             <type>8</type>
             <!-- Obligatory PDN_CONN params -->
             <params>
             <!-- start traffic param mbtaid=0 default pdn defaul bearer -->
             <!-- start traffic direction =3 ul and dl -->
                 <mbtaid>0</mbtaid>
                 <direction>3</direction>
             </params>
         </proc>

         <cmd>
         <!-- Delay in msec -->
            <delay>5000</delay>
         </cmd>

		<!-- DETACH cid=0, bid=0-->
		<proc>
		    <type>1</type>		
		</proc>
		
		<cmd>
		    <!-- Delay in msec -->
		    <delay>5000</delay>		
		</cmd>

		
	    </thread>
	</scen>


    </scenarios>

</lte>
